name: Battle Decks
summary: From legendary developer Codemasters, creators of Operation Flashpoint, DiRT, Overlord, and more, Battle Decks is a totally unique game of strategic card warfare. Build your deck from advanced and near-future style unit cards and go head-to-head with real opponents in PvP conflicts.
info:
• 平台: IOS
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 发行日期: 2015-10-08
  • 官方网站: www.chillingo.com/game/battle-decks
